[Global Namespace]

Global namespace.

Types
DropTypes
enum DropTypes {...}

How an item was dropped.

Values
DROP_DEFAULT

(0) Default/unspecified.

DROP_PLAYER_CMD

(1) By a player via drop/dropammo/dropsecammo command.

DROP_PLAYER_DEATH

(2) By a player killed.

DROP_NPC_DEATH

(3) By an NPC killed.
